Container.Name: develancacheui_backend
Container.Overview:
Backend Container for an UI for LANcache.
Note: Also add the DNS line if you errors in the container logs that it can't get the manifests due to a 401 unauthorized. Also use --sysctl net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6=1 as extra parameters if you get problems, when using IPv6.
!!!backend and frontend containers MUST run in the same custom user bridge/custom user network!!!
Container.Requires: backend and frontend containers MUST run in the same custom user bridge/custom user network.

Config.Name: timezone
Config.Description: timezone Changing the TZ and LANG only impact the way the container logs. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones

Config.Name: language codes
Config.Description: Changing the TZ and LANG only impact the way the container logs.
